meaningMnemonic: On your <radical>mouth</radical> is a <radical>stamp</radical> that you <kanji>tap</kanji>, <kanji>strike</kanji> and <kanji>slap</kanji> to create a beat! The stamp looks like a little drum, but you're really just hitting your mouth for fun (the stamp was an excuse to make it seem normal).
readingMnemonic: As you <kanji>tap</kanji> and <kanji>strike</kanji> your own mouth, <reading>こう</reading>いち comes dancing into your bathroom. "Hey now, this looks fun, can I try tapping my mouth too?" he asks. "Sure," you say, and offer him a stamp.
